attributes.action: Freeze council taxes,mortgage and loan repayments amid the CoronaVirus crisis.
attributes.background: No council taxes,mortgages and loans repayments till CoronaVirus crisis finish. People need food and medicine.

rejection.details:
Suspending payments for council tax, mortgages and loans is a matter for individual councils, mortgage providers and lenders, and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
